semantic_identifier: [GOLD-32]: Add conflict detection for positioning recommendations across segments
title: Add conflict detection for positioning recommendations across segments

sections.text: Implement backend logic to detect when generated positioning recommendations for different segments directly contradict each other (e.g., opposing value props, differentiators, or objection responses). Define a canonical set of recommendation categories and a simple rule-based contradiction model to flag conflicts at generation time. Persist conflict metadata (segments, fields, and conflicting statements) so the UI can surface it in subsequent tickets.
